casebody.data:
Stephen C. NICHOLSON, individually and as Administrator of the Estate of Geraldine Anne Nicholson
v.
Arleen Kaye THOM, M.D. No. 378P11-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. James W. Musselwhite, Lumberton, Clifford Britt, Winston-Salem, John Allyn Chilson, for Nicholson, Stephen C., et al Dan J. McLamb, Raleigh, Andrew C. Buckner, for Thom, Arleen Kaye (M.D.).

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 22nd of December 2014 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
Ervin, J. recused.
